responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "017A968C4CD08D421A02918934297606", "This is a warding token, to prevent attack from the wild dead. Someone made this for those Ramkin. They\'ve never demonstrated the skill with magic to work a ward like this by themselves. Who is charming these beasts against the undead? More concerning though? Where are the undead they\'ve been charmed against? I\'d bet my neck there are more than minotaur and ramkin inside our mountain.")
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_NPC_RunesingerNaho_7_Response
